sentence_zh_TW: 我們將在第一百次的相聚上舉辦一個特別的慶典活動。
sentence: We will hold a special celebration at our ______ gathering.

sentence_zh_TW: 在徒步旅行的時候，岩石可以成為你登山過程中的一個挑戰。
sentence: While hiking, a ______ can be a challenge during your ascent.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個特定的情況下，選擇能夠達成的目標是非常重要的。
sentence: In this particular scenario, it is very important to choose achievable ______ goals.

sentence_zh_TW: 在夏天，螞蟻經常在戶外忙碌地工作，以尋找食物。
sentence: During the summer, the ______ can often be seen working busily outdoors to find food.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這次產品展示中，我展示了幾個新產品，每一個都很獨特。
sentence: During this product showcase, I presented ______ new items, each of which is unique.

sentence_zh_TW: 擁有豐富而充實的生活往往會使人感到快樂，並提高生活的質感。
sentence: Having a rich and fulfilling ______ often leads to happiness and enhances the quality of life.

sentence_zh_TW: 在考試中，學生必須選擇正確的答案以獲得高分。
sentence: Students must choose the ______ answer on the exam to achieve high scores.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這部電影裡，有幾個角色展現了驚人的才華，贏得了觀眾的喜愛。
sentence: In this movie, a ______ characters showcase amazing talents that win the audience's love.

sentence_zh_TW: 這種簡單的設計使得產品的使用變得更加方便和直觀。
sentence: This ______ design makes the product easier and more intuitive to use.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了能夠成功地開始這個新項目，我們需要仔細計劃每一個細節。
sentence: To successfully ______ this new project, we need to plan every detail carefully.

sentence_zh_TW: 在選擇電影時，選擇你喜歡的類型會讓觀看體驗更加愉快。
sentence: Choosing a movie of the right ______ will enhance your viewing experience.

sentence_zh_TW: 這片湖泊非常深，潛水者需要特別小心才能安全探索。
sentence: The lake is very ______, and divers need to be especially careful when exploring it safely.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位官員在社區中發揮了重要的領導作用，幫助解決問題。
sentence: This ______ plays an important leadership role in the community, helping to solve issues.

sentence_zh_TW: 我在祖父的影響下，對歷史產生了濃厚的興趣。
sentence: I developed a strong interest in history through the influence of my ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 他在比賽中獲得了第三名，這讓他感到非常驕傲。
sentence: He won ______ place in the competition, which made him feel very proud.

sentence_zh_TW: 一位好的律師能夠幫助你解決法律問題，並為你提供必要的指導。
sentence: A good ______ can help you solve legal issues and provide you with the necessary guidance.

sentence_zh_TW: 他沒有參加會議，因為他有其他的承諾需要履行。
sentence: He didn't attend the meeting ______ he had other commitments to fulfill.

sentence_zh_TW: 公司會定期評估員工的表現，並考慮提升他們的薪資。
sentence: The company regularly assesses employee performance and considers to ______ their salaries.

sentence_zh_TW: 這家餐廳的食物有很多選擇，能夠滿足不同顧客的需求。
sentence: This restaurant offers a ______ of choices that cater to different customers' needs.

sentence_zh_TW: 這部電影真的非常有趣，讓我們全場觀眾都捧腹大笑。
sentence: This movie is really ______, making the entire audience laugh out loud.
